asset1.title: Connect to S3 bucket and check contents of bucket
asset1.author: Deepak Rangarao
asset1.description: Note: Using the AWS S3 cli, we will take the connection parameters, list contents of an existing bucket and upload new files to a bucket

asset2.title: Run ANY StreamLit application
asset2.author: Deepak Rangarao
asset2.description: NOTE: This should be used in conjunction with the WGET to download files task. Upload a zip file to box/any location with multiple text files and 1 text file for the test data to use, each having a prompt you want to test. Now invoke this task as a 2nd step to read each of the prompt files and execute the prompt against the chosen model and display a F1  score compared to test dataset.
